original: @33b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: rgya gar skad du

original: shr'i dzam bha la sya samkshipta s'a dha nam /
analyzed: shr dzam bha la sya samkshipta sa dha nam

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du

original: dpal gnod gnas kyi mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: dpal gnod gnas kyi mdor sdud ba sgrub ba thabs

original: dpal gnod gnas la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal gnod gnas la phyag tshal lo

original: sngar bstan pa'i cho gas snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dpal gnod gnas gsum pa'i sa bon ni mdog ser ba stong pa'i lhas mnan pa zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan pa /
analyzed: sngar ston ba cho gas snying gar zla ba dkyil khor gyi dbus su dpal gnod gnas gsum ba sa bon ni mdog ser ba stong ba lhas gnon ba zla ba phyed ba rnam ba rgyan ba

original: de nyid las rdzogs pa'i dpal gnod gnas kha dog ser po phyag gnyis pa ;
analyzed: de nyid las rdzogs ba dpal gnod gnas kha dog ser po phyag gnyis ba

original: g-yas pa'i phyag na p'i dza p'u ra ka / g-yon pa'i phyag na rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs bzhin pa'i ne'u le 'dzin pa sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can zhabs gnyis kyis dung gi tshogs dang / padma'i tshogs kyi gter chen po mnan pa /
analyzed: g-yas ba phyag na p dza pu ra ka g-yon ba phyag na rin po che char rab tu bebs bzhin ba neu le dzin ba sangs rgya lnga cod pan can zhabs gnyis kyis dung gi tshogs dang padma tshogs kyi gter chen po gnon ba

original: autpal sngon po'i phreng ba 'dzin pa /
analyzed: autpal sngon po phreng ba dzin ba

original: rgyan @34a * //
analyzed: rgyan

original: thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: thams cad kyis rgyan ba

original: dzam bha la'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dzam bha la gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom ba byed

original: rang gi khyim du yang rin po che sna tshogs la sogs pa'i char rab tu 'bab par 'gyur bar bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi khyim du yang rin po che sna tshogs la sogs ba char rab tu bab ba gyur ba bdag nyid bsam ba byed

original: de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya ching ba byed ste

original: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcings te gung mo dag ni dbu ma'i tshigs gsum pa bkug pa ni dzam bha la'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lag ba gnyis khu tshur ching te gung mo dag ni dbu ma tshigs gsum ba gugs ba ni dzam bha la phyag rgya zhes byed

original: aom dzam bha la dza len dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom dzam bha la dza len dra ya sva ha

original: sngags 'di nyid kyis rje btsun la chu gtor ba brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngags di nyid kyis rje btsun la chu thor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bul ba byed

original: phyi nas mchod pa bya ste sngags bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nas mchod ba byed ste sngags bzla ba byed

original: de nas dngos grub ni sbyin pa chen por 'gyur te the tshom med do //
analyzed: de nas dngos grub ni sbyin ba chen por gyur te the tshom med do

original: dpal dzam bha la'i sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: dpal dzam bha la sgrub ba thabs mdor sdud ba

original: slob dpon badzra tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: slob dpon badzra tsandra go mis mdzad ba rdzogs so

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang khams ba lo tsa ba dge slong ba ris sgyur cing zhus
